column5: hey all when i make my report ill type something it will show up but when i put a picture in it dosnt show the pic it just stays as is do i just keep typing?will it show up on my post please help thanks Little Angler
Yes, the pics should show on the post. If not, we'll fix it.
nope it does not  for me
You haven't posted it yet so how do you know? Pics won't show on previews if you taking them straight off your desktop. Try it!
is there an easyw ay to downsize all pics? i dont want to sit here and down size like 20 pics

i use photobucket.co you can do a bulk upload then just copy the image right to your report.  the thing im having an issue with is the video posting.  Try photobucket i find it very easy to use.  Cheers!
